pricing.title: Simple and Fair Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your parking needs. Start with a basic plan and upgrade when you're ready.
pricing.footer: All plans include our core parking-sharing features. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

free.name: Basic Plan
free.description: Ideal for discovering neighborhood parking sharing.
features: Book a spot up to 3 days in advance
Parking groups with up to 10 members

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Unlock all booking features for the best experience.
features: Parking groups with up to 15 members

neighbourhood.name: Community
neighbourhood.description: Ideal for large neighborhoods and communities.
features: 1 private community group with up to 50 members

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, fair, and accessible. Join the parking revolution in 4 easy steps.

createOrJoin.title: Create or Join Group
createOrJoin.description: Start by creating a parking group with your neighbors. Or join existing group in your area.

shareSpot.title: Share Your Spot
shareSpot.description: When you're not using your parking spot, make it available to group members.

earnCredits.title: Earn Points
earnCredits.description: For every hour you share your spot, you earn 1 parking point to use elsewhere.

useSpots.title: Use Others' Spots
useSpots.description: Use your earned points to park in other members' spots when you need them.

subtitle.line1: The first neighbor-to-neighbor parking exchange app.

footer.description: Revolutionizing urban parking through community sharing. Join thousands of users for stress-free and friendly parking.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use the service.

interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions
interpretation.subtitle: Interpretation
interpretation.description: Words with capitalized initials have meanings defined under the following conditions.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.description: For the purposes of this privacy policy:

account.title: Account
account.description: A unique account created for you to access our service or parts of it.

affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.description: An entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with a party.

application.title: Application
application.description: Refers to FriendSpot, the software program provided by the company.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Small files placed on your device by a website.

device.title: Device
device.description: Any device that can access the service, such as a computer or mobile phone.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: Any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.

service.title: Service
service.description: Refers to the application or website or both.

serviceProvider.title: Service Provider
serviceProvider.description: Any natural or legal person who processes data on behalf of the company.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Data collected automatically, generated by the use of the service.

you.title: You
you.description: The individual accessing or using the service.

dataCollection.title: Collection and Use of Your Personal Data

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: We may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Collected automatically when using the service.

tracking.title: Tracking Technologies
tracking.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to track activity on our service.

cookies.title: Cookies or Browser Cookies
cookies.description: Small files placed on your device.

webBeacons.title: Web Beacons
webBeacons.description: Small electronic files used to collect statistics.

usage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
usage.description: The company may use personal data for the following purposes:
usage.provideService: To provide and maintain our service.
usage.contact: To contact you via email, phone, or notifications.
usage.businessTransfers: For business transfers such as mergers or acquisitions.
usage.otherPurposes: For other purposes like data analysis or marketing.

retention.title: Retention of Your Personal Data
retention.description: The company retains personal data as long as necessary.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.description: We use commercially acceptable measures to protect your data.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: The service is not intended for children under 13 years old.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.description: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party sites.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time.

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern access to and use of the FriendSpot mobile application and website https://friendspot.app ('Application'). By downloading, installing, or using FriendSpot, the user accepts these Terms without reservation.

accountCreation.title: 2. Account Creation
accountCreation.content: Using certain features requires creating a user account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of their credentials. The user is solely responsible for all activities conducted through their account.

userContent.title: 3. User Content
userContent.content: Users may post content (text, images, etc.) via the Application. The user retains ownership of their content but grants FriendSpot a non-exclusive, free, worldwide license to host, display, and distribute it as part of the service. Users must not post any illegal, defamatory, discriminatory, or rights-infringing content.

subscriptions.title: 4. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Certain features are accessible via subscription through Google Play and Apple App Store. Financial terms (pricing, renewal, cancellation) are defined by each store and apply automatically. Refunds are managed solely by the stores, not directly by FriendSpot.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, design, logo, and trademark of FriendSpot are protected by intellectual property laws. Any reproduction or use without authorization is prohibited.

feedback.title: 6. Suggestions and Feedback
feedback.content: Any suggestions, ideas, or feedback submitted to FriendSpot may be freely used without obligation of compensation.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FriendSpot strives to ensure the proper functioning of the Application but does not guarantee the absence of errors, interruptions, or data loss. FriendSpot is not responsible for content posted by users. Points are not currency: they cannot be sold, exchanged for money, or refunded. FriendSpot is not responsible if a spot is not actually available or if a user fails to honor their commitment. FriendSpot does not guarantee the permanent availability of the service (maintenance, bugs, etc.).

abuseReporting.title: 8. Reporting Abuse and Violations
abuseReporting.content: In case of copyright infringement or illegal content, users can contact: support@friendspot.com

userResponsibilities.title: 9. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users must use the application in compliance with local laws (e.g., condominium rules).

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: FriendSpot reserves the right to suspend or delete any user account in case of non-compliance with these Terms.

applicableLaw.title: 11. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any disputes will be brought before the competent courts in France.
